Title: S7 Ep. 311 Adrienne Garland: Building Communities, Empowering Women, and Navigating the Digital World
Description:
In this episode of The Intern Whisperer Podcast, we’re joined by Adrienne Garland, founder of She Leads Media, a powerhouse company dedicated to elevating women’s voices through conferences, events, publishing, and podcasting. Adrienne talks about the art of gathering — creating intentional spaces that foster connection and support for women across industries. She shares her thoughts on how we can use our time more intentionally in a digital world that constantly pulls us in, advocating for rest from screens and awareness of how our actions align with our true desires.

Adrienne also discusses the upcoming 10th anniversary of She Leads Media and the exciting developments surrounding her annual conference, which promises to empower attendees with love, tools, and strategies to take their businesses to the next level. We dive deep into her perspective on the future of work, the impact of AI, and how to maintain balance in a world that constantly demands more from us digitally. From setting boundaries with technology to empowering women in STEM, Adrienne shares valuable advice on navigating both the digital and real-world spaces. Tune in for a conversation full of insight, inspiration, and a reminder to run your own race!

We hope you enjoy this week's episode of The Intern Whisperer. The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing #Skills #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
